claim: Mercedes leads the Formula 1 Constructors' Championship on points.
reasoning: The most recent constructor standings in the database (2017 Singapore Grand Prix, raceId 982) show Mercedes in position 1 with 475 points, ahead of Ferrari (373 points) and all other constructors. This confirms that Mercedes leads the Constructors' Championship on points.

content.text: I'll verify this claim by exploring the database schema and querying the relevant data.

input.description: List all tables in the database

content.content:
CREATE TABLE constructorStandings
(
    constructorStandingsId INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    raceId                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    constructorId          INTEGER default 0 not null,
    points                 REAL   default 0 not null,
    position               INTEGER,
    positionText           TEXT,
    wins                   INTEGER default 0 not null,
    foreign key (raceId) references races(raceId),
    foreign key (constructorId) references constructors(constructorId)
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE constructorStandings
(
    constructorStandingsId INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    raceId                 INTEGER default 0 not null,
    constructorId          INTEGER default 0 not null,
    points                 REAL   default 0 not null,
    position               INTEGER,
    positionText           TEXT,
    wins                   INTEGER default 0 not null,
    foreign key (raceId) references races(raceId),
    foreign key (constructorId) references constructors(constructorId)
);

content.content:
CREATE TABLE constructors
(
    constructorId  INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    constructorRef TEXT default '' not null,
    name           TEXT default '' not null
        unique,
    nationality    TEXT,
    url            TEXT default '' not null
);

tool_use_result.stdout:
CREATE TABLE constructors
(
    constructorId  INTEGER
        primary key autoincrement,
    constructorRef TEXT default '' not null,
    name           TEXT default '' not null
        unique,
    nationality    TEXT,
    url            TEXT default '' not null
);

input.command: sqlite3 "/Users/david/workspace/claimdb/test_dbs/formula_1.sqlite" "SELECT cs.raceId, r.year, r.name, cs.points, cs.position, c.name FROM constructorStandings cs JOIN constructors c ON cs.constructorId = c.constructorId JOIN races r ON cs.raceId = r.raceId ORDER BY cs.raceId DESC, cs.position ASC LIMIT 20;"

content.text:
The data is clear. The most recent standings in the database (after the 2017 Singapore Grand Prix) show **Mercedes** in **position 1** with **475 points**, leading Ferrari (373 points) and Red Bull (230 points). The claim that "Mercedes leads the Formula 1 Constructors' Championship on points" is supported by the data.
